com.haydende.heymusic

Class SongListAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<SongListAdapter.SongViewHolder>
      • com.haydende.heymusic.SongListAdapter

  • public class SongListAdapter
extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<SongListAdapter.SongViewHolder>
    Subclass of RecyclerView.Adapter that adapts the Song data for use in UI components.
